name: dom
title: dom
description: A small library of functional functions, DOM events and Event Streams for HTML and SVG.

scripts.build:
cat


js/dom.js js/dom-activate.js js/dom-touch.js js/dom-swipe.js js/dom.popable.js js/dom.toggleable.js js/dom.switchable.js js/dom.moveable.js js/dom.swipeable.js js/dom.locateable.js js/dom.dialog.j

         > dist/dom.js && minify dist/dom.js
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/dom.css dist/-1.1.1.css && cp dist/dom.min.css dist/dom-2.0.0.min.css
scripts.publish: git pull origin master && npm run build-version && git add dist/* && git commit -am 'Build version 1.1.1' && git push
